Articles.Content: Could some one please make a game mode where all of the parts are unlocked but you can still get contracts an manage funds?

Until this mode is officially added, what you can do is, at the start of a new career game, use Alt+F12 (once that window opens, hold alt for 5-10s to make the science and money buttons appear), and give yourself enough money and science to unlock what you want to, then remove all the science and money (using same menu), then re-add whatever starting cash amount you want to have.

TL;DR: workaround for Career game minus tech tree grind

Yep, Tree Toppler will do what you want. I use it to unlock all of the tech nodes that I could get for a particular R&D center level and turn on part unlock costs so that I just play career mode with funds but no science requirements. You can also use it to unlock all of the tech nodes, including ones you couldn't normally reach because of the R&D center level. Additionally, the third mode lets you unlock specific nodes for free, but (for the moment) still requires you to purchase the prerequisite nodes and can't unlock ones past the R&D center level requirements. If someone asks, I can probably get around those limits pretty easily.
